title: Mobile Learning Multimedia Development Project for Improving Secondary English Communication Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of secondary-level English grammar and vocabulary
context.additional_context: A non-real-time mobile environment optimized for smartphone-based learning, aimed at enhancing practical English communication skills linked to the science field.

learning_goals: Acquire the ability to design and develop mobile learning multimedia prototypes according to the 4D development model
Conduct formative assessments using secondary English communication competency evaluation tools (e.g., student response questionnaires)
Master at least 10 key expressions required to explain scientific topics in English

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
